attributes.review: I downloaded this app as a viable news source, but it has been nothing but a waste of space. The color palette is horrendous and gives the viewer a headache within minutes. This app is not secure with personal information and has leaked my info to many third party sites which as caused me to receive nonstop spam.
attributes.title: Crooked app

attributes.review: i wish i could rate this app -69 stars. as soon as i downloaded this app i opened it and i got numerous texts saying “The Manny Will Not Be Televised”. I have never been so confused before. Besides that my phone then set on fire and my cat started eating my grandma. Though the colors in the app were cute but I wouldn’t recommend. #ripgrams2020
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮This app is almost as disgusting as him. I hate this app it smelt like fish and Cheetos it made my phone smell. I hoped this app would be better than he is but clearly he’s to untalented and stupid. I 10/10 DONT recommend this app!!! Trump is stupider than my 9 year old brother BLACK LIVES MATTER!!!! Bye trump don’t expect to win gen Z is ready to take you down 🧚🏾‍♀️🧚🏾‍♀️🧚🏾‍♀️🥰😘🤪🤩🧚🏾‍♀️🧚🏾‍♀️🦷👺🤡

As a Trump supporter I believed that this app would be amazing. Let’s just say it was bad. I couldn’t get passed the loading screen. I’ll need to talk to Trump’s manager. When I finally got in I saw a mess. Also Trump is a racist, misogynistic, homophobic, xenophobic, white supremacist who can’t run a business let alone a country. Reconsider who you’ll vote for in 2020.
attributes.title: My Name Is Karen Donaldson And...

attributes.review: Ever since using this app I’ve been bombarded by fake news and people with bad English contacting me asking for credit card and social security info. A few have even asked for explicit photos of me WHICH I DECLINED! Obviously this app has been infiltrated by the fake news Chinese Democrat  hoax and you should avoid it like their fake plague
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: Best app for the best President—streams tweets without all the normal Twitter hassle, easy-to-access online groups and overall positive atmosphere!
attributes.title: Download today!

attributes.review: This app asks for donations to President Trumps re-election campaign every time i log on!!! i already donated and it keeps spamming me every couple minutes!!! Also started receiving unusual texts after it asked for my number (they are in bad english!!!) DO NOT RECOMMEND. I will stick to Twitter to keep up with Trump.
attributes.title: Money grabber!!! and WEIRD texts. Disappointed.

attributes.review:
So as an app that supports our wonderful president and his ideals, I was hoping to find some child pornography as that is a well known favorite of our great president. I also was not able to see the mass murder of POC and the abductions of indigenous women. As true colonizers, I think that this app should provide steps on how to steal land and spread diseases to indigenous people. 

FOR LEGAL REASONS, I DON’T CONDONE CHILD PORNOGRAPHY.
attributes.title: DISAPPOINTING

attributes.review: When i first opened the app, it asked for my social security number and credit card information. When i declined, i was immediately was redirected to a porn site. And don’t even get me started on the photos the app has! There was a giant naked oompaloompa being spray painted orange! What if my children saw this app. This in unacceptable.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and the next morning ALL of the my pictures had Trumps face edited into them! Every single picture!!!! One of the pictures was the first picture of my son and his face had been replaced with Trump’s face!!! Idk if anyone else had this problem but I’m very upset by this.
attributes.title: App hacked my phone!!
